pages.text: $(li)The Respawn Anchor is a block that allows you to set the Respawn Point in The Nether.$(br)$(li)Place this block and insert 4 $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/glowstone_block)Glowstone blocks$(/l) right clicking on it.
$(li)Finally right click on this block again to Set your new $(l)Respawn Point$().
